body:
Wake up!
->This is a reply.
    Yes it is a reply.

[[Open your eyes|Openyoureyes]]

title: Openyoureyes
body:
Whew, For a second there, I thought I was the only one to make it to land alive.

[[What Happened?|What1]]
[[Where are we?|Where1]]
[[Who are you?|Who1]]

title: What1
body:
You don't remember? Wow, you must have hit your head pretty hard during the fighting
I wasn't on deck at the beginning, but apparently, our ship was attacked by a swarm of monsters
Not many people made it off the ship, and you are the only person I've found that made it to the beach with me.
Lucky for us, none of the monsters followed us to the island [[Back|Openyoureyes]]

title: Where1
body:
Honestly, I'm not sure. As far as I knew, there weren't supposed to be any landmasses in this area of the sea.
Our best bet would be to explore inland and see if we can find any signs of civilization.
[[Back|Openyoureyes]]

title: Who1
body:
Oh, my apologies. Name's Logan. I'm a... well I guess I'm a wanderer now.
I'd say more, but we really need to find some food and fresh water. The wreck was 
days ago, and I'm starting to get a bit parched.
[[Back|OpenyourEyes]]

title: Start(Carpenter)
body:
Can we build it!?!
->Yes we..
    Whoa, whoa, whoa there buddy, we havent even checked the material cost. Slow your roll.
